body_html: What would be helpful would be an implementation of the modified bessel function with a custom gradient function. This repo https://github.com/nicola-decao/s-vae/blob/master/hyperspherical_vae/ops/ive.py wraps scipy methods which isn't the right approach for a contribution here, but is in many ways better than my approach approximating using power series expansions for small and large concentration parameters. If someone has some guidance for the best method to get an implementation of the bessel function then I'd be willing to make a go at a generalized implementation that supports dimensions P > 4.
